verbose_text: The Src family kinases are a large family of non receptor tyrosine kinases that have been associated with apical junction actomyosin contractility and can phosphorylate and activate MLCK.
evidence: Src family kinases are a large family of non-receptor tyrosine kinases that have been associated with apical junction actomyosin contractility                            and can phosphorylate and activate MLCK
